welcome_message_title: Welcome to Santa Cruz de la Sierra
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santa Cruz de la Sierra! Get ready to experience the vibrant culture, beautiful architecture, and delicious food that this charming city is known for. We hope you have an amazing time exploring and enjoying all that Santa Cruz has to offer.

restaurants.name: Casa Italia Delicatessen
restaurants.description: Casa Italia Delicatessen is a italian restaurant located in Santa Cruz de la Sierra.
restaurants.address: Av. Pirai 502, Santa Cruz de la Sierra

restaurants.name: Café Ateneo

restaurants.name: Maria Castaña

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Trompillo Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights operated by smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
